Package ohos.event.notification

Class NotificationRequest.NotificationMultiLineContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.event.notification.NotificationRequest.NotificationMultiLineContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable
    Enclosing class:
    NotificationRequest

    public static final class NotificationRequest.NotificationMultiLineContent
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Constructs a notification that includes multiple lines of text.

    This multi-line notification is different from a long-text notification constructed by NotificationLongTextContent. The long-text notification displays notification content only with a single line in the notification bar and hides the text exceeding the allowed display length. By contrast, the multi-line notification can display up to seven independent lines of text in the notification bar.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Notification#ANS

      • setTitle

        public NotificationRequest.NotificationMultiLineContent setTitle​(String title)
        Sets the title for this multi-line notification. If both this method and setExpandedTitle(java.lang.String) are called for this notification, the title set in this method will be displayed only when this notification is collapsed, and the one set in setExpandedTitle(java.lang.String) will be displayed when this notification is expanded.
        Parameters:
        title - Indicates the title of this multi-line notification.
        Returns:
        Returns this NotificationMultiLineContent object.
        Since:
        3

      • setAdditionalText

        public NotificationRequest.NotificationMultiLineContent setAdditionalText​(String additionalText)
        Sets the additional text to be included in this multi-line notification.

        The additional text is mainly a supplement to the notification text set by calling setText(java.lang.String). The font of the additional text is smaller than the notification text and is displayed in a separate line.

        Parameters:
        additionalText - Indicates the additional text to be included.
        Returns:
        Returns this NotificationMultiLineContent object.
        Since:
        3

      • getBriefText

        public String getBriefText​()
        Obtains the brief text that has been set by calling setBriefText(java.lang.String) for this multi-line notification.
        Returns:
        Returns the brief text of this notification.
        Since:
        3

      • setBriefText

        public NotificationRequest.NotificationMultiLineContent setBriefText​(String briefText)
        Sets the brief text to be included in this multi-line notification.

        The brief text is a summary of this multi-line notification and is displayed in the first line of the notification. Similar to setAdditionalText(java.lang.String), the font of the brief text is also smaller than the notification text set by calling setText(java.lang.String).

        The positions where the brief text and additional text will display may conflict. If both texts are set, only the additional text will be displayed.

        Parameters:
        briefText - Indicates the brief text to be included.
        Returns:
        Returns this NotificationMultiLineContent object.
        Since:
        3

      • getExpandedTitle

        public String getExpandedTitle​()
        Obtains the title that will be displayed for this multi-line notification when it is expanded.
        Returns:
        Returns the title to be displayed when this notification is expanded.
        Since:
        3

      • setExpandedTitle

        public NotificationRequest.NotificationMultiLineContent setExpandedTitle​(String longTitle)
        Sets the title to be displayed when this multi-line notification is expanded. After this title is set, the title set by setTitle(java.lang.String) will be displayed only when this notification is in the collapsed state.
        Parameters:
        longTitle - Indicates the title to be displayed when this notification is expanded.
        Returns:
        Returns this NotificationMultiLineContent object.
        Since:
        3

      • addSingleLine

        public NotificationRequest.NotificationMultiLineContent addSingleLine​(String line)
        Adds a single line of text to this notification. You can call this method up to seven times to add seven lines to a notification.
        Parameters:

      • toString

        public String toString​()
        Description copied from class: Object
        Returns a string representation of the object. In general, the toString method returns a string that "textually represents" this object. The result should be a concise but informative representation that is easy for a person to read. It is recommended that all subclasses override this method.

        The toString method for class Object returns a string consisting of the name of the class of which the object is an instance, the at-sign character `@', and the unsigned hexadecimal representation of the hash code of the object. In other words, this method returns a string equal to the value of: 

         getClass().getName() + '@' + Integer.toHexString(hashCode())
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        a string representation of the object.
        Since:
        4
